tool_description: An API that has all live tv stations in Kenya and uganda **NOTE for educational purposes only**
name: LIVE TV API
title: LIVE TV API

api_list.name: GET the channels description and status
api_list.description: Shows the description, status whether online or offline, number of views
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/channels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/channels"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

channels.name: Citizen TV Live
channels.description: Citizen TV Kenya is a general news and entertainment television channel headquartered in Nairobi. It offers news bulletins, movies, TV series, music programs, talk shows, and other programs. Live streaming and recorded videos can be watched on the official website & watch on kenyalivetv.co.ke only.

channels.name: KTN Home Live
channels.description:
KTN Home Live stream for the latest news, politics, entertainment, and sport. Watch Kenya's first independent and authoritative channel 24/7. 


KTN Home is a Kenyan free-to-air television network that was launched in March 1990 by Jared Kangwana.

It is headquartered at Standard Group Centre, Nairobi.
It was the first free-to-air privately owned television network in Africa, and the first to break KBC's monopoly in Kenya.

KTN Home (KTN Kenya Classics) Channel will bring you the most popular programs that were aired on KTN. Be sure to be entertained every day on this channel. The Home of Classics and Great Comedies of all time.

channels.name: Ramogi TV Live
channels.description:
Ramogi TV is a 24-hour free-to-air channel offering general entertainment to customers and broadcasts in Dholuo language.

The channels programming line-up includes news, talk shows, commentaries, current, social, real life issues, news and educational content.

Ramogi TV is widely available on ADN, Signet, Citizen Digital app, Viusasa and YouTube.Ramogi TV is a 24 hour television station tailored for the Luo speaking audience as the primary target.

channels.name: Inooro TV Live
channels.description: Inooro TV Kenya is a Kikuyu television station based in Kiambu, Kiambu County. It offers latest news, music programs, TV series, talk shows, and other entertainment programs. Live streaming can be viewed online on kenyalivetv.co.ke

channels.name: NTV Live
channels.description: NTV Kenya is a commercial telelvision station owned and operated by Nation Media Group. It broadcasts news programs (politics, business, sports, showbiz, TV drama series, music programs, documentaries, talk shows, and more. The headquarters is located in Nairobi, Kenya.

channels.name: KBC Channel 1 Live
channels.description:
KBC Channel 1 is a free-to-air television channel owned by Kenya Broadcasting Corporation (KBC), the state-run broadcasting organization of Kenya. The headquarters is located in Nairobi. It offers a wide range of programs, such as news bulletins, dramas, music shows, sitcoms, reality shows, animated shows, children's programs and more.
Live streaming can be viewed online on kenyalivetv.co.ke

Kenya Broadcasting Corporation (KBC) is the state-run media organisation of Kenya. It broadcasts in English and Swahili, as well as in most local languages of Kenya. The corporation started its life in 1928 when Kenya was a British colony. It was the first station in Kenya.

channels.name: UTV Live
channels.description:
UTV Kenya is a FREE TO AIR Channel with a cumulative audience of more than 4,100,000. We are currently available countrywide via Signet channel 516 (Signet- UTV) TV 45,PANG 79, all free to air decoders,and online www.utv.ke Motivated by the quest to advance in
development of digital television network and the introduction of advanced digital electronic. UTV Television has intensified efforts to enable more and more Kenyans access quality television broadcasting.

The Television has extended It’s coverage to over 70 per cent of the Kenya’s population and is expected to rise to over 80 percent by the end of year 2020. Currently, UTV has funs across 41 Counties in Kenya, thanks to signal distributors. The demographic consists both youths and old generation who consume commercials, news, art and music (gospel, classic, country) and sports.

The station runs a series of local TV programs such as SINEMA KIKWETU, KIJIJINI, MTUMISHI, Youth Movies (developed by the youth) in our youth talent development segment, Shamba Tosha (a framers training segment), Hadithi zetu, Action movies, Nigerian Movies and many more.

channels.name: Hope TV Live
channels.description:
Hope TV Kenya Hope Media is a ministry of Christ Is The Answer Ministries (CITAM). It comprises of two broadcasting stations, radio – Hope FM and TV – Hope TV. These stations are complimented with the creative design division Hope Creative and Recording Studios – Hope Studios.

Therefore providing a converged media environment. Hope Media stations are run on clear Christian principles as avenues for outreach, nourishment and holistic ministry for varied audiences with the Gospel message of Jesus Christ Hope Media through radio and TV endeavors to deliver well-balanced content in form of up-to-date information, entertainment and education broadcasting around the clock.

Programs on Hope FM and Hope TV are designed to Inspire, Educate and Challenge (ICE) listeners and viewers with wholesome content in diverse demographic groups; children, youth and adults both male and female in our selected target markets.

Our current product offering includes sermons, praise and worship gospel music, inspirational talks, commentaries, sports, news and advertising services Hope Media broadcasts are hosted on Terrestrial, Satellite, Online and Mobile platforms accessible anywhere around the globe.

channels.name: Family TV Live

channels.name: HCK TV Live
channels.description:
HCK TV Kenya ( Hope Channel Kenya) is a premier television station that is owned and operated by the Seventh-day Adventist Church in Kenya (East and West Kenya Union Conferences).
Located at East Kenya Union Conference Headquarters, in Nairobi, Hope Channel Kenya (HCK) has been in operation since November 2013.

HCK started to broadcast in Nairobi and its environs but in January 2015 went countrywide and so far covers parts of neighbouring countries such as Tanzania, Uganda, and South Sudan.

HCK produces and broadcasts programs every day of the week for 24 hours. So far we
produce and broadcast 50% local content and supplement with programs from our international channel (Hope Channel).

We boast of a viewership of about five million people half of which are Seventh-day Adventists. Our strongholds include Nairobi, Mombasa, Malindi, Eldoret, Nakuru, Kericho, Kisumu, Kitale, Marigat, Oljororok, Nyahururu, Nyeri, Embu, Meru, Machakos, Kitui, Mt Elgon, Migori, Kendu-Bay, Kisii, Kilgoris, Narok, and Kakamega, Garrissa, Mandera, among others; and parts of neighboring countries including Busia in Uganda, the Eastern parts of Arusha and Mwanza in Tanzania.

This is evidenced by the number of phone calls and text messages we receive from these areas for the various programs that we broadcast

channels.name: Elevate TV Live
channels.description:
Elevate TV  is a Kenyan based television based in Nairobi Kenya. We broadcasts in locally produced and imported content in English and Kiswahili languages. As Elevate TV Channel we  provide  television media outreach to minister and build lives in the kingdom of God, in the nation of Kenya and beyond. 

We are inspired by our achievements in deploying programs in the following channels: LIGHT OF LIFE BROADCAST for 10 years through GBS TV, Truth FM, Kingdom TV and MBCI TV.  Our bedrock organization, Life church International and her related ministries, have been a strong pillar committing funds for the gospel outreach where millions of lives have been reached and ministered to through the Television and Radio ministry. We feel obliged to meet the needs of our viewership listeners that are of diverse religious, social and economic backgrounds in Kenya and the region.

channels.name: Signs TV Live
channels.description:
Signs TV Kenya was formed in 2011 operating on a social enterprise model with the main objectives being to educate, inform and entertain in sign language by extension enhancing Disability and the Deaf Culture.

In 2015 we applied to the Communication Authority of Kenya to run a television station broadcasting in Sign Language and were granted; we are now broadcasting effective February 2017 on free to air platform as Signs TV and offer publicity in terms of advertisements, documentaries and general partnerships to organizations at very affordable rates.

Signs TV has been broadcasting free content in sign language since 2017 with a central mission to build cultural bridges, remove barriers, eliminate stigma and create a society that allows free interaction between persons with disabilities (PWD) and non-PWDs.

Signs TV is also playing a crucial role in the response to the global pandemic by collaborating with the government and partners to analyze the challenges faced by PWDs in light of COVID-19, while highlighting solutions, which include providing virtual interpreters in hospitals, universities and places of employment.

channels.name: Emmanuel TV Live
channels.description:
Emmanuel TV is a television station with one way and one job. The way is Jesus and the job is to talk about Him to others through words and deeds. Our motto is: Changing lives, changing nations and changing the world. God’s Word is the most effective instrument for change.
The people hear and change. Nations hear and change. The world hears and changes.

Emmanuel TV is a television station with one way and one job. The way is Jesus and the job is to talk about Him to others through words and deeds. Our motto is: Changing lives, changing nations and changing the world. God’s Word is the most effective instrument for change. The people hear and change. Nations hear and change. The world hears and changes. Emmanuel means God is with us! (Matthew 1:23) Watch Emmanuel TV and witness the power of God in action. God keeps giving us plenty of evidence to believe in Him.

channels.name: Edu Channel Live
channels.description:
EDU TV Kenya is owned and powered by the Kenya Institute of Curriculum Development (KICD) in its content delivery. This channel provides engaging KICD educational videos for holistic learning. It is amazing how the institute has factored in the needs of all learners, both in secondary and primary schools, to provide an educative platform at the comfort of their homes.

KICD Educational Channel (EDU channel) is the first ever digital education channel in Kenya.It enhances equality and access to quality educational content to Kenya and beyond hence unify society in terms of knowledge,national goals and entertainment.The Channel is used to disseminate curriculum and curriculum support materials.

channels.name: Channels Television Live
channels.description:
Channels Television is a leading 24-hour news channel broadcasting live from Lagos, Nigeria - West Africa.  Our mission is to produce and broadcast television programs of quality and integrity that recognize and challenge, the intelligence and curiosity of our viewers. 

The station has bagged the ‘Best Television station of the Year’ an award endowed by the Nigerian Media Merit Award Trust – fourteen times in the last twenty years (2000, 2001, 2003, 2004, 2008, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2018 and 2020).

Channels team has produced feature programs, which have received commendation throughout the country; video footage of events and happenings in Nigeria, shot by Channels News crew have been used widely by reputable broadcast organisations such as BBC-TV, CNN, ITN and McNeil/Lehrer News Hour.

Do not forget to subscribe to this channel for up-to-date news on politics, business, health, current affairs, entertainment, and sports in Nigeria.

channels.name: Goodwill TV Live
channels.description: Goodwill TV is a Christian television network that offers programming that is focused on promoting positive values, faith, and hope. The channel aims to provide a platform for spreading the message of Jesus Christ and inspiring viewers to lead a life of purpose and meaning. The programming on Goodwill TV typically includes sermons, teachings, and discussions on religious topics, as well as worship music, prayers, and interviews with spiritual leaders and experts. The network is designed to be a source of comfort, inspiration, and guidance for individuals seeking a closer relationship with God.

channels.name: Oracle TV Live

It aims to provide viewers with accurate and reliable information, while also entertaining and engaging them with quality programming. Oracle TV is available on a variety of platforms, including satellite, cable

Oracle Television Network Kenya is a commercial licensed Christian Television station headquartered  in Nakuru KENYA  airing NATIONWIDE on the SIGNET platform. It offers programs on holistic Biblical teachings, societal or community based shows, lifestyle and business programs for children, youths, men, women and the entire family.

channels.name: Ithaga TV Live
channels.description: Ithaga TV is a Kenyan television channel that primarily broadcasts news, current affairs, and cultural programming in the Kikuyu language. It aims to provide informative and engaging content for viewers interested in Kenyan and global news, politics, business, sports, and entertainment. The channel is available on various platforms, including digital terrestrial television and online streaming.

channels.name: Mountain Of Fire TV Live
channels.description:

The channel features a variety of programs such as sermons, worship services, testimonies, and other Christian content that is intended to edify and encourage its audience. 

Mountain of Fire TV Kenya is affiliated with the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, a Pentecostal Christian organization with a global presence.

channels.name: AfroSports TV Live
channels.description: Afro Sports TV is a digital media platform that focuses on covering sports news, analysis, and highlights with a particular emphasis on African athletes, teams, and events. It aims to provide comprehensive coverage of various sports disciplines and promote African sports culture globally through engaging content, interviews, and documentaries.

api_list.name: GET the channels social accounts and contacts
api_list.description: It has links to different social platforms such as Facebook.....
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/social"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/social"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET the channel stream_url
api_list.description: It has the links and channels name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/Links"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com/Links"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-tv-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
